popup.title: GSOPs 2.6 by CG Nomads
popup.content:
Thank you for installing GSOPs, where Magic Meets Reality. This update includes support for 2DGS, Solaris, splat mirroring, and more!

GSOPs is actively used by professional artists and studios worldwide, and we are committed to keeping GSOPs free and open source. Your support helps sustain its development.

Please enjoy!

buttons.text: Support GSOPs and Unlock Early Access Features
